channel.title: Nice Man, Nice. Best # Of People Online
channel.description:
![image|690x399](upload://lxWwfMMbZDdJpAuCtWF2zOJ6EUI.jpg) And the time right now is also 6:06PM, so yeah- that's a thing. ![image|82x76](upload://yJCUP8M1OAlWbs4AiUaPHALnQid.png) It's 6:06PM Friday the 3rd, add a 1 to the 3, and it's Friday the 13th, and there's 666 people online at 6:06PM, replace the 06 with 66, and it's Friday the 13th, there's 666 people online, and it's 6:66PM, remove the PM and add in the factor that the background is still demonic/spooky, it's Friday the 13th, there's 666 people online at 6:66PM with a really spooky background.
Okay, wow, ToL is haunted right now.
_edit:_ oh, and on top of that, earlier my steam balance was $6.66, so ummm.... ![image|690x411](upload://af9lBZ6xlSmouX6IR6jHOPYaaTF.jpg) Today has been... devilish.

item.title: Nice Man, Nice. Best # Of People Online
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
I feel the presence of a great darkness on this dark eve of witching…

It’s here- run.

Read full topic
item.source: Nice Man, Nice. Best # Of People Online

item.title: Nice Man, Nice. Best # Of People Online
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
And the time right now is also 6:06PM, so yeah- that’s a thing.
It’s 6:06PM Friday the 3rd, add a 1 to the 3, and it’s Friday the 13th, and there’s 666 people online at 6:06PM, replace the 06 with 66, and it’s Friday the 13th, there’s 666 people online, and it’s 6:66PM, remove the PM and add in the factor that the background is still demonic/spooky, it’s Friday the 13th, there’s 666 people online at 6:66PM with a really spooky background.

Okay, wow, ToL is haunted right now.

edit: oh, and on top of that, earlier my steam balance was $6.66, so ummm…

Today has been… devilish.

Read full topic
